profile.name: Profile
profile.delete_profile_text: Deleting your Dersu profile is permanent and irreversible, please confirm.

upload.hint: Choose a GPX file from your device
upload.error_title: There has been an issue when importing the GPX file
upload.error_text: If you think this a problem with Dersu please contact support@dersu.uz. More information below. Thanks.

planning.name: Planning
planning.set_activity_reminder: Please don't forget to set an actity in the Terrain tab.

route_details.no_date: Set expedition's departure date and time

conditions.no_bpa_report: No avalanche report available for this date

terrain.no_activities_for_route: No activities defined for this route yet

search.hint: You can search for users in Dersu by their name or surname
search.min_characters: We need at least 3 characters for the search

group.search_hint: Press + to add people to the expedition

errors.token: There is an issue with your credentials, please try again.
errors.expedition_data_save: unfortunately you have no connection now, we haven't been able to save your expedition data

registration.name: Profile details
registration.read_privacy_policy_error: You have to confirm that you have read the Privacy Policy
registration.accept_terms_and_conditions_error: You have to accept Dersu's Terms and Conditions

location_access_warning.title: Access to your Location
location_access_warning.text: Dersu uses your location during expeditions, even with when the application is closed, in order to alert you of potential hazards, relevant weather changes and points of interest. If you wish, you can consult Dersu's privacy policy in the 'Settings' section of the app. Your device may show you now a related warning. Thanks.

location_access_error.title: Location access error
location_access_error.text: Dersu cannot support you without full access to your location during expeditions. Please open your device settings and grant Dersu location access ALWAYS, including while in the background. Thanks.

three_by_three.title: Before continuing, please consider:
three_by_three.hint: Talk to the group, share next steps and ask if they have any questions. Do we continue?
three_by_three.conditions_hint: Look around keeping in mind the meteo report.
three_by_three.conditions_text: Do you have clear visibility of your surroundings? Watch out for clouds and fog. What's the temperature and your thermal sensation? What is the forecast for wind, rain and snow?
three_by_three.terrain_hint: Keep in mind if you are close to waypoints or dangers.
three_by_three.terrain_text: Do you know where you are and where you are heading? Can you handle the upcoming risk expositon? Have you objectively assessed the consequences of doing it?
three_by_three.group_hint: Analyse how has the group recently advanced and how is everyone else around you doing.
three_by_three.group_text: How much have you covered and how much is left? Are you on time? Do you have a plan B or alternative route? How are they physically and emotionally? Do you have enough food and drink?

login.title: Welcome
login.text: To be part of this adventure we need you to be part of Dersu.

route_search.title: Planning
route_search.hint: Type the name of a route or location.
route_search.no_routes_found: We haven't found routes by that name.
route_search.no_locations_found: We haven't found a location by that name.
route_search.no_routes_for_this_location: We haven't found routes at this location.
route_search.error: Apologies, there's been an error while searching, more information below.
